Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Works just like it should. Prints great. looks neat. It's a little slow printing just simple designs on cds though. That's the only reason for 4 stars, otherwise a great printer.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Quality at a Great Price!
Item.Review: I bought this printer as a replacement for my Stylus Color R280. Just by initial appearances, the Artisan 50 appears to be the same printer as the R280 with some minor changes such as the buttons. This is not bad though because I really liked the R280 for its quality as well.If you want an inexpensive printer that prints great quality pictures as well as CD's, I would highly recommend the Artisan 50.I also give B&H a thumbs up! [...]

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Purchased specifically to print CD/DVD disc labels. Print quality of first run of about 50 discs was excellent. Haven't yet figured out how many discs I can print on one set of ink cartridges, so it remains to be seen how expensive ink consumption turns out to be. But the unit was so inexpensive to begin with, I figured I couldn't go wrong. Documentation is poor. There's an option in the printing menu to print multiple copies of the same disc label, but no information about the procedure to reload and resume printing with each new disc. After reloading, I kept getting an error message that the tray was out of position. I contacted technical support via email, explained my question in detail and they could not offer an answer. Finally, I discovered there is a button on the front of t ... he unit that lights up after the first disc is ejected, and must be pressed to resume printing after re-loading. Printing discs is a little slow -- much slower than the unit prints the same label on a sheet of paper. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Great for photos and DVDs. Previously used Epson R200 to print over 5000 DVDs, photos, text. Miserly on ink. Artisan 50 just new improved model. Had 3 weeks, printed 150 DVDs & photos, text. This model also appears to be very economical on ink.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: great printer for office or art printing
Item.Review:
Set up was easy, though the print menus took a while to figure out .. by default , the printer works at "speed" setting causing banding. You have to drill down into the menus to find the slider, move it to quality and the printer prints slow - and nice! I am printing straight out of InDesign using cmyk photoshop files linked into InDesign on Archive roll paper cut at 8.25" wide with lengths up to 30" .. I built my own paper feed out of foam board to guide the long paper in . . . . a little tricky but it works!
Color is deeper and richer compared to my good old C80.. I can't say enough about the quality and longevity of Epson paper and inks ... which if hung uprotected after five years show only slight discolor. If printed on semi-gloss, you can't tell the print is five years compare ... d to new..
Haven't used it enough to judge ink usage. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: prints lovely inmages on paper AND on disc. i wish it took less time to print a whole disc (black on white background, not a very saturated image) but for [$] this printer is a dream.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review:
Cons: it eats up print cartridges like crazy. Quite costly
The print quality is OK. It's constantly replacing the print cartridges that I don't like. It gets costly and annoying after a while

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: I am really stuck on Epson printers
Item.Review: The Epson Artisan 50 is a replacement for my Epson R280 that just simply wore out. The reason I decided to buy the Artisan 50 was because I can use the same ink cartridges that I used for my R280. Another nice feature with Epson is that I can also use the same ink cartridges in my Epson RX680. The main reason I stick with Epson is the individual ink cartridges and the extremely good prints that they produce.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: havnt used it much but i will use it for CD/DVDs only as i am a professional videographer, and i will use it for short run prints (eg. 10-50 a project) applications, print looks good. dries decently fast, loading 1 at a time will be a pain but much cheaper that an automated printer! I will probably get another at some point. Very worth it and now even more professional looking dvds!

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: Good print Bad to make it to print
Item.Review: I buy this printer to print CD`s looks fine for the cost of the unit but is a pain in the neck to make it to print, send command nothing happend then have to turn off/on clean sistem open and close doors then printer start, real pain in the neck.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: Epson - The king of photo printing!
Item.Review:
Pros: Precise CD and photo printing
Cons: limited features
I beat the heck out of my printers. This is my 4th EPSON printer. Number 3 is still in use! Their CD printing is simply the best. Additionally, they have always provided me with top-notch overall photo printing.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review:
Pros: speed, simplicity and quality
Cons: price of the ink (of course)
While the ink is priced at the level of fine perfume on 5th Avenue, the print speed is really good for pretty high quality photo images on glossy paper. Features such as touch screen, photo card inputs etc. (which are entirely unnecessary if you're printing directly from your computer) are missing and not missed. The paper feed works well and is overall far less problematic than HP photo printers. It is quite worth the money.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: I use this printer strictly for photo and disc printing and as a possible backup if my laser dies. Stepped up from the Stylus color Photo 200M when I went to Windows 7. 200M printed fine, but there were issues with the disc printing software and the native drivers in 7. Couldn't be happier with the out put. Best Photo on premium glossy paper is phenominal! Disc printing is professional looking with startling quality at the default settings. Have been using for about two weeks now and can't really cite a downside. Not the fastest, but the work I'm expecting is time consuming at high quality level settings. Would recommend to any and all.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: I have this printer and its great..The prints are vivid and true color..The speed to make a photo is great and i look forward to making my work stand out..Thats why i bought this..Anyway,,The only con is the dry time on the photos...Its seems like it take forever to dry once they come out...But i guess you have to give up something to get good stuff...[...]..Ps..Its not all about how high the resolution numbers are..Its about the colors..Enjoy..

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: So far very happy with it.
Item.Review: Use it mostly for print pictures. The speed and color are right on. I had a Canon i960 and was happy with it until it died. Went with the Epson because of the CD/DVD printing and multi ink tanks. I have a Mac and had no problem setting it up. Works well with being hooked up to Airport. I like it so far and have no problems yet.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: Darn it, First RMA in years
Item.Review:
Pros: none at this time
Cons: Intermittent computer communication errors. Used same cable/usb port with a different printer and it works fine. This printer has a defect.
Been years since I have needed to RMA an item from the egg. Doing that right after this feedback.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review:
Pros: This one replaced an Epson R220. The color is much more accurate and it is fast. Prints CD's beautifully. This is a great printer for the money.
Cons: Ink is expensive, so find a cheap source for remanufactured cartridges.
The need to swap the print output tray to print CDs or paper is a bit of a small nuisance.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Have been working with this unit for 2 weeks and find that it is well worth the money. It replaces a worn out Epson R300 that also served me well and is faster and surprisingly accurate for a non calibrated system.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Excellent for photos and printing on CDs & DVDs. Vivid colors

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Although I only use this for printing on disk faces, I am very happy with the results, images come out clear and the print speed is fairly quick.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: I was looking to replace my dear R280. The Artisan 50 Inkjet did the job. Easy to use, better ink usage then the R280 and Iuse it a lot.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: Great price for a great product
Item.Review: Does a great job printing CD/DVD's. Software included is so easy to use. Easy setup instructions.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: Was very easy to set up. Prints great photos. I like being able to replace just the ink cartridges that run out.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review: I use it at home to print letters,,Pictures Fast and easy to use I haven't found anything wrong yet

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use; clean; Fast
Cons: Uses a LOT of ink
It was used for photo printing, which came out great.

Item.Item: Epson Artisan 50 Color Ink-jet printer - 37 ppm - 120 sheets
Item.ReviewTitle: good value for the price paid
Item.Review: Printer was easy to set up and has a lot of bang for the price paid.
